str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The chief shepherd. From arche and poimen; a head shepherd.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To make clear (visible, manifest), make known. From phaneros; to render apparent.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From a primary komeo; properly, to provide for, i.e. to carry off.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A crown, garland, honor, glory. From an apparently primary stepho; a chaplet, literally or figuratively.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
Unfading, fadeless, enduring. From amarantos; 'amaranthine', i.e. fadeless.
